Name: The Ballad of Radolf
About the game: Story After years of peace an island emerges from the sea with the Demon race, now the Demon race threatens to throw the world into chaos. Can you stop the Demon race and restore peace to the world. Choose your own path I've taken a non-linear approach allowing you to choose your own path in how you want to proceed. Gameplay A turn based RPG where you sail between islands to defeat the Demon King's forces. Multiple endings Your ending will change depending on how many bosses you beat before facing the final boss.
